mapper.select: SELECT * FROM URL_INFO order by urlno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN.RESTAURANT_INFO (RESTIDX, RESTNAME, RESTADDRESS, RESTJIBUNADDRESS, RESTPHONE, RESTMENU, RESTPRICE, RESTPARK, RESTOPEN, RESTMENULIST, RESTTAG) VALUES(#{restIdx}, #{restName}, #{restAddress}, #{restJibunAddress}, #{restPhone}, #{restMenu}, #{restPrice}, #{restPark}, #{restOpen}, #{restMenuList}, #{restTag})
